name: codespaces-claude-mcp
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y curl ca-certificates; echo "== Install Claude Code =="; curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | bash; echo "claude: $(command -v claude || true)"; echo "== Install uv (for uvx) =="; curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh; export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"; echo "uv: $(command -v uv || true)"; echo "uvx: $(command -v uvx || true)"; echo "== Add MCP servers =="; claude mcp add context7 -- npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp || true; claude mcp add playwright -- npx @playwright/mcp@latest || true; claude mcp add serena --scope project -- uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena-mcp-server --context ide-assistant --project "$(pwd)" || true; echo "== Versions =="; gh --version; node --version; npm --version; python --version; claude --version || true; echo "== MCP list =="; claude mcp list || true'
